episodes.title: The Truth About Grant Cardone: My Experience Inside His 10X Scientology Cult
episodes.description:
After spending several years as a 10X business coach inside Grant Cardone's organization, I’ve finally decided to expose the truth. What many people don’t realize is that Cardone’s empire is deeply tied to Scientology, operating with cult-like tactics to manipulate, control, and exploit entrepreneurs seeking success.

In this video, I reveal:
✅ How Scientology principles are embedded in 10X coaching
✅ The high-pressure sales tactics and mind control methods used
✅ Why Cardone’s organization operates like a cult
✅ The hidden connection between Grant Cardone and Scientology’s leadership
✅ My personal experiences working behind the scenes

If you've ever attended a 10X Growth Conference, worked with Cardone University, or followed Grant Cardone’s business advice, you NEED to see this before investing more time and money.

🔔 Subscribe for more eye-opening content!
📢 Comment below if you’ve had a similar experience!

#GrantCardone #Scientology #10X #Exposed #BusinessScam #Cult #10XCoach #GrantCardoneExposed #Entrepreneur #HighTicketSales
